title: The Healthy: Healthy Living with Expert-Backed Advice
author: Miranda Manier
description: Find research-backed answers from licensed health & wellness professionals and clinical wisdom for your relationships, work and life.
cleaned_text: Most Popular Meet the Team Shop for Your Health & Wellness At The Healthy @Reader's Digest, we spotlight the brands and products that help you feel your best. Our experienced shopping editors scour the internet to bring you the items worth buying, as well as interview renowned medical experts for their most trusted product recommendations.
